A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is easily the worst thing to happen to Star Wars\, since the infamous "Star Wars Christmas Special" -if you don't know what that is\, look it up on Youtube... it's real\, and just slightly worse than watching this movie.  

Last Jedi ruins the heroes you used to like\, makes the bad-guy irrelevant\, and takes you through a tedious 2.5 hour long chase scene with characters who are so boring that you will be rooting for the bad-guys to win just to make it all stop!

I truly believe that the writers and director of this movie hate everything that made Star Wars great. Disney should be ashamed for green-lighting this.
